1.content: You are first mate John Grenier. you are a gunner on the new, state of the art Marathon class cruiser Vancouver. Just released from the Cairo shipyards the ship has become a test bed for ONI Prototype Slipspace drive Omega 13. You are part of a crew of 1000 Command crew and others plus 300 marines. the ship is outfitted with 2 MAC guns, 12 pelicans and 20 Longsword fighters. "Okay, all personnel clear the enigne room!" Captain Jacob Tobruk's voice boomed over the ship wide intercom. Being an anti-fighter gunner onboard the ship with your station near the engine room you reluctantly head to the mess hall and stare out the porthole. the year is 2522, earth is now a planet bustling with people and industry. The USNC ONI teams finally enhanced a normal Slipspace drive to extend to longer ranges. your ship has become a test bed for the new drive. "all non-essential personnel, head to cryo!" "Ahhhh mannnnnnn!!!" your shipmates groan. while walking to cryo, you hear the sound of a Slipspace drive activating...
1.title: Slipspace? My arse!

choices: A toddler section of a daycare
11.content: Your dream of becoming an admiral is cut short as you're yanked from cryo and sent up to the bridge, as are other crewmen yanked from cryo. at the bridge, you see an extrordonary sight. a huge starling flies past the bridge. the captain and the command crew are amazed. while in the middle of the jump, the drive malfunctioned and spat the crusier out, considerably smaller in size. "What the Hell?" the captain mumbles, staring out the viewport. "Sir!" A Member of the crew screams, "Reactor has been disabled and the engines are down!" a ping is heard, the ship then out of control crashes into a...
11.title: where the heck are we?

choices: Try to fix the ship with crew members
111.content: Your ship goes down the chimney of a house. Luckily, there is no fire. The captain tries to think of what to do. "We need a few members of the crew to scout the area." he says over the ships intercom, "Volunteers come to the front deck imediately."
111.title: A house

1111.content: The captain turns to see you and the other one marine who volunteered. "Men, take a hog from the vehicle bay and scout the area." he tells you, "Report any and all information on the schematics of our location. "Sir, yes sir!" you two reply as you head for the vehicle bay. "Who will drive?" the marine asks.
1111.title: Go to the front deck

11111.content: You drive the wharthog and the marine gets on gunner. You slowly drive in the kitchen when a golden retriver started chasing the wharthog. You gun it and go hi-speed throughout the house. you then shout " Its a little late but I never even got my perment." The marine was about to shout then you got blasted with an air soft gun. The wharthog did a flip and crashed in a corner. The passenger is unconcious.
11111.title: You drive

choices: The kid that shot up your ride
111111.content: You pull your dazed injured comrad out of the busted warthog. YOu wrap his arm over your shoulder and make a mad dash across the living room area. Meanwhile the dog almost immediatly grabs the warthog in its jaws and shakes it around violently. He then chews it up and swallows it. You couldnt imagine what would of happened if you were still inside! You take cover next to a coffee table. You ask the marine if he is alright, his ankle is sprang but other than that hes ok. Suddenly the floor begins to shake once more. Somebodys coming. Looking up you see its,
111111.title: near brush with death

1111111.content: The boy comes waltzing towards the dog. "Was that one of my toy cars?" he asks the dog. You spot two other toy cars both of which are remote controlled theres a blue and yellow monster truck and a red convertable.You help the wounded marine over to one of them. The dog spots you, barks and runs towards you. You help the marine get into the...
1111111.title: The kid that shot up your ride

11111111.content: You Jump in the monster truck puting the marine in the passenger seat. You floor it, going away from the dog, but unfortuantly the monster truck just isn't fast enough. Your last thoughts are "so thats what the dog had for breakfast.
11111111.title: Monster truck

choices: try to get the boys help
11111112.content: You jump into the convertable, help the marine in and floor it. The covertable is just fast enough to escape the dog's jaws. You have to decide what to do, fast.
11111112.title: convertable

111111122.content: "Hey, you!" you call to the enormous boy, "Hey down here." "hun? who said that?" he says stumbling backwards. The lst thig you see is the boys giant foot falling towards you.
111111122.title: never trust anyone under 9

choices: The girl is still unaware of the tiny soldiers
1111112.content:
You and Scott ((That will be the marines name)) eyes widen in horror as a monsterous figure walks in thru the front door of the house. It definatly looks human, female, and young. Probably about 18 years old. The mutt that tore up your warthog happily runs over to the giant then begins to pant happily and lick her hand.

"Eeew get off me! Get get go!" The girl yelled. Just then, the girls 10 year old brother, who was the one who shot your warthog walks into the living room.

"Hey! What are you doing with that BB Gun?!" The girl asked.

"Umm...just target practicing on cans hehe." The boy said.

"Yeah well not while im here! Get your butt upstairs and take your smelly dog with you to!" The girl said. The boy looked down with a sad look on his face and walked upstairs with the dog. The girl sighs then walks right past you and scott into the kitchen. You try to radio in the captain but for some reason the signal is jammed.

"Damn! Nothing." You said and looked at Scott. You can hear the girl talking on the phone as she fixes up something to eat in the kitchen. She then comes back out with a bowl of cereal in hand.

"Look out!" You cried as the teens huge white slip-on shoe crashed down just a few feet from you and Scott. The girl sits on the sofa and starts to watch a little TV. As you and Scott plan your next move,
1111112.title: A teenage girl

11111121.content: The girl looks down at you and Scott who were about 2 inches. "Holy crap!" she scremed.
11111121.title: The girl looks down

11111122.content:
Well, here you were; out of the frying pan and into the fire. You'd narrowly avoided one hapless scenario in exhange for a worse one. With what remained the warthog in shattered wreckage, thanks to a certain canine, you had no hope of getting very far by walking. You start to debate with Scott over which course of action to take, urging him to help you reach a decision quickly, before the unaware titaness inadvertently harms you, or worse. He takes note of that urgency, since you're both ant-sized before her immense shoe, and you both agree that she could do some serious damage to the rest of the crew. They needed to be aware that the house had inhabitants

Even so, there was no means of contact, thanks to whatever was jamming the radio signal. That left you and Scott with two conflicting options. Your idea is to sidle along the sofa in hopes of getting out of range of whatever was blocking your transmission, while Scott's plan is to attempt establishment of contact between the two of you and her. to you that sounds incredibly risky, but his logic is fairly sound. She was a human just like you, just incedibly larger in your eyes. If she was a decent person, like Scott hoped, she could help you out and perhaps even save the crew. You ponder these two options carefully as the TV drones on in your ears.
11111122.title: Just Another Human

111112.content:
You leap out of the vehicle and run for your life. Looking back you see the dog pick up the vehicle in his mouth, and shake it violently. You are sure that the marine is dead and proceed to get to higher ground. Minutes later you are on top of the refrigerator. Over the com, you here the captain, "Where are you?" he asks. You tell him everything that happened to you and the marine.

"We're sending a hornet to pick you up." he assures you, "Standby.". You sit down and wait until you see the hornet over the on the other side of the refrigerator. You get on the side and get back to the ship. Once inside you see that the ship has been fixed. "Captain!" one crewman shouts, "We've got the ship back up and running.". "Good." the captain replies, "Now let's unshrink ourselves.". "I'm afraid we can't do that sir." the crewman replies, "The slipspace drive still isn't working.". "Then we fly this ship to the UNSC base here in New Mombasa." the captain began, "Then, we let them take a look at our ship.". "Sir, yes sir!" the crewman replied as they ran to their posts.
111112.title: run

choices: Switch to an unlucky marine's POV
1111121.content: The cruiser takes off and begins to fly towards the front door. "It's closed." the captain sighs. The ship flies by the door and is headed towards the window. Suddenly, the front door flies open, and slams your ship dead on. "CRAP! Hold on marines!" the captain shouts. The force is so large, that some of the unlucky crew and marines fly out of the glass, and go spiraling out of the ship.
1111121.title: Bad Luck

11112.content: The marine hops into the drivers seat while you go to the passenger side. You two drive off to what seems to be a kitchen. You upload the schematics to the captain. A dog comes in from the front door and sees the warthog driving off. The dog begins to chase the warthog. "Aaah!!" the maine shouts in terror. The warthog crashes into a wall knocking the other marine unconcious. The dog gets closer and closer. "Oh no!" you think to yourself.
11112.title: The marine drives

111121.content: You put the warthog into reverse and floor the pedal. Your warthog races backwards and goes between the dogs legs. You, however, crash again, and the dog picks up your warthog in his mouth and begins to shake it violently. You cant escaoe and are crushed by the force of the dogs jaws.
111121.title: Floor It!

1112.content: You, and a handful of crewman, go to the main engine room to see the damage. "It seems that the slipspace drive is critically damaged!" one of the engineers shouts. You begin to think to yourself that you may be shrunken forever. "If we can fix this slipspace drive, we may be able to escape this small world" he reassures. Suddenly, the slipspace drive explodes killing some of the crewmen.
1112.title: Fixing Drivers

11121.content: You run out of the engine room with full speed. Several crewmen do the same. You head up to the bridge where the captain is dismissing a small group of about six marines. "Captain!" you begin to shout, "The slipspace drive has just been destroyed!". "What!?" the captain exclaims in disbelief, "I had a feeling something weird was going to happen. He turned around and thought for a moment then looked back. "Well," he began to say, "I'm not sure what to do now. I do know, however, that we need to fix the main reactor core so we can at least fly this ship to a command base. Also, I haven't heard back from the volunteers, will some of you crewmen like to volunteer?"
11121.title: To The Bridge!

111212.content: You go to get a 'hog with two other crew members, a marine and a engener. You decide to be the...
111212.title: Volunteer for the search team

choices: see if the people from the first 'hog are still alive
1112121.content: You blast out of the ship at full speed and see a dog eating a 'hog. The marine on the turret opens fire at the dog hoping it will barf the 'hog back up but to no avail. The dog looks round and sees you, some quck manovering and you head straight for the kichen doging the dog's teeth. You swerve and crash into one of the chairs at the table, the marine gets trown forward and lands on the marble floor as you jump out seeing the dog come bounding after you. The dog grabs the 'hog with the engener still in it, you hear his screams as he dissapers down it's throat. You decide to...
1112121.title: Driver

11122.content: You start to examine the slipspace drive and realize that it is not completely destroyed. But you do see that it is going to explode any second. You begin to turn around to get clear of the blast, but alas, it is too late. The explosion catches you in it and you die from third degree burns.
11122.title: Check the damage

112.content: you land in a daycare but not just any daycare but one for toddlers. ''Sparten, were gonna need ya,'' One of your crew members called out. You go to help and he asks you what to do.
112.title: A toddler section of a daycare

1121.content: you get a couple of crewmen and start fighting. As you shoot and grenade the children one of your men is steped on by the teen daycaring for the children while she was searching for her phone. The next casulity was when another toddler stuck a crew member in his pants. The man had no choice but to kill himself. All that could be heard from your blood gushing body was a scream as a teerhing toddler chewed you to death
1121.title: fight

choices: Go with the marines to fight
Tell the marines not to go
1122.content: You and a few marines run to a small section of lego blocks. You begin to build them up and make a huge base. "Captain, we've made a small outpost of legos." a marine says. "Legos eh?" the captain says jokingly, "Well our ship is being tossed around like a toy, and we are receiving heavy damage." "We can't just wait here and do nothing!" a marine shouts out.
1122.title: The LEGO Base

11221.content: You and the marines go out to distract the toddlers. You begin to fire away at the toddlers while screaming until they turn around they began picking you and you're fellow men up. Eating them, chewing them, so many different horrors. One of them shoved you in his diaper while you were fighting. Then a mountain of turds piled up on top of you crushing your body and breaking your bones. You died, but allowed the crew of the ship to evacuate.
11221.title: A Great Distraction

choices: Tell him to try to make it in pelicans
Tell him to try to go on foot
11222.content: The marines run to save the ship as you stand back and watch them. The daycare girl walks in and screams out "Nap time!". Your marines succesfully make it to the ship and come back out in a pelican. All of the rest of the crew are also loaded into seperate pelicans, and escape the ship right before it blows up. You take off and join the large group of other pelicans. The group flies outside above a busy street. They land in a large pile of flowers. The crew all step out of their pelicans and rendevous. "Our ship was the only way we would get a message out.". the captain says. "We're screwed man! SCREWED!!" a marine shouts. The captain began to reply "Not completely, we could still fly to the base.". A crewman reponds, "We wouldn't have enough fuel to get to the UNSC underground base.". "Any suggestions?" the captain asked.
11222.title: The Escape!

112221.content: You tell the captain you should go in the pelicans. "Well we could cover alot of distance even though we won't make it." the captain says, "Fine, we will take off now.". Everyone is loaded into the pelicans and begin to take off. Once they are over the street again, somthing else comes out of slipspace. It happens to be another UNSC Marathon class cruiser. "Any UNSC crew respond!" the captain says. There is no response at all. It seems that it is just drifting in a straight line until it opens fire on your pelicans. "What the hell is going on!" the captain yells. The shots destroy three of your nine pelicans. "Marines, we need to-
112221.title: What's Going On?

choices: try to hold out untill you recive back up
1122211.content: you take an assult rifel and a br and board the ship. As you walk up and down the halls you relize that the ship was already breached and theyre was fight. You explain this to you're fellow marines and one asks, " a fight between what?" As if it heard youre question two flood infected marines show up and attack you. Both the flood are taken out, then as you head back outside you hear the captin say, " We have to pull out we are under to much fire." With that the captin left you and about twenty marines straned on a flood infected ship! There is a chance of jumping out of the ship but the drops about 10 feet
1122211.title: Board the ship!

11222112.content: you decide to hold out. You split the marines into two groups. One to secure a room to hold off in another to locate any survivers and escort them back to the room. Which team will you go with, its up to you
11222112.title: try to hold out untill you recive back up

1122212.content: "Marines we need to retreat!" the captain shouts. The ships turn around and retreat. While retreating three more ships were lost; now only three ships remain. Your heart races as the pelican takes off at full speed, with the other Marathon cruiser right on your tail! The captain begins to say something "Marines-
1122212.title: Retreat!

11222121.content: "Marines split up!" the captain cries out. The three ships go in three different directions. The cruiser follows the captain's pelican and shoots him down. "Captain!" you cry out as the ship spirals out of control.
11222121.title: split up!

112221212.content: Your pelican is now being chased by the cruiser. The pilot is successful in dodging the shots, but then your pilot realizes something. "We're running out of fuel" she says as the pelican begins to lose altitude. The other six marines brace themselves for the worst. The cruiser is ready to fire and has your pelican locked on.
112221212.title: Stay on your POV

choices: escape using the open man hole
1122212122.content: You brace youre self as the pelican goes down. Then the pelican crashes and everything goes black. You wake up not in a wrekage but in a sewer. " It was the only place we could find. Both pilots are down and we have one wounded," One marine said. You looked around and see a couple rats being shot at. You see an open man hole. You grab the only two wepons you can find: a smg and a pistol. Lucky for you 4 of the 6 marines were ODST's. One tells you that youre on point. You hear a radio. Its the other pelican, they say that they can pick you and youre team up in 5 minutes. Rats are now starting to swarm and everyones low on ammo.
1122212122.title: Brace yourself

11222121221.content: The ODST's are doing a good job holding off. " Aim for theyre eyes," you say. Pelicans will be hear in three minutes. one rat comes and grabs the wounded guy and runs off one more round in the pistol. Two more of youre men were killed before the pelicans get theyre. You and the two ODST's get on the pelican. You refil on ammo and the pilots ask you what to do
11222121221.title: stay put

11222122.content: "Stay in formation!" the captain shouts. The cruiser is still after the pelicans, and you know that this is it. The pelicans are running out of fuel and are descending rapidly. "Hold on!" the captain orders as the pelicans drop into the busy road. Your pelican is headed straight for a high speed car. "Oh no..." you think, "This is it."
11222122.title: stay in formation!

112222.content: He quietly sneaks passed the giant sleeping toddlers,but one toddler woke up and stuffed him in its diaper where it pees on him
112222.title: Tell him to try to go on foot

11223.content: you tell the marines not to go and you then hear the captin say, '' Wait we are being put down, oh crap it's the babysiters boy friend launch the peli-.'' That was the last words of the captin and all marines other than the ones in the pelican as he put his lighter to the ship and melted it. After the guy left the marines went to recover what they could. They came back with a burnt wharthog and some ammo. Then it happened the base was being stormed by ants!
11223.title: Tell the marines not to go

choices: Switch to one of the running marines' POV
112231.content: You start to fight the ants, but they crawl all over and overwhelm you. You're armor is losing it's sheilds fast. The marines begin to run, but one marine tries to rescue you.
112231.title: fight the ants

choices: Join the fight and help the marines
retreat deeper into the lego base with the surviving marines
1122311.content:
"Sir! Come on!" You yell as you pull the unconcious spartain out of the lego base. "Bull's eye" you cry as you shoot an ant in the eye with a magnum, killing it instantly. The ants start scurrying away, apparantly because of you killing the ant. You joy fully sling the spartain over your shoulder and run out of the base.

When you get out of the base you see why the ants left so suddenly. They left to get the stronger soilders. The soilder ants began swarming over the marines that ran out of the base. They were all slaugtered, some were stampled to death by the sudden rush of ants had their heads choped of by the ants powerful jaws, some had their heads choped of by the ants powerful jaws and the most horrific of all, ripped limb from limb.

You pull the injuredspartain back into the base of lego and remember the instant death of the ant that got shot in the eye. "Shoot them in the eyes!" you call to the losing marines. Supprisingly the marines start to salvage the battle, focusing their shots at the ants' eyes.
1122311.title: Switch to the marine's POV

11223112.content: You rush into the base trailing the spartain behind you. The marines run in behind you, shooting at the ants' eyes as they run. You reach a wall in the base and go into a room to the...
11223112.title: Fall Back!

112231121.content: You turn into the room to your right which is full of bricks. Luckily you make a barracade with the help of the marines who were right at you heel. You shut the room up just as the ants smash against the makeshift baracade of stacked bricks. You quckly raidio the ship for evac. "Captain come in, repeat come in, this is private Daniel Jones. I'm with 361 in the lego outpost, repeat in lego outpost ith 361. Over." You wait for about five minutes and try to radio Hillary Harrison, one of the hornet pilots, one of his close freind. "Hillary come in, this is Daniel Jones. Repeat Hillary this is Daniel Jones, over." you speak into the radio. "Shhhh! Daniel be quiet," you hear over the radio "it's the toddlers nap time and one has the ship cluched in its hands." "Hillary,"You wisper "me 361 and about a dozen marines are stuck in the lego base and we're being sieged by soilder ants." "All right I'm coming over."
112231121.title: spartain 361

1122311211.content: You press up againts the barracade holding the ants out but it does not last for long. The barradage falls and you start shooting the ants. They start swarming into the room but you keep them relitively at bay. "Daniel come in Daniel," You hear over the radio "This is Hillary, over" "Hillary this is Daniel," you call into the radio, "The ants have broken the barracade and.... ... oh no! they've just aten anothe marine. Take this you damned creatures from hell!" You call before charging at the ants. The grab the spartains foot but you kick their head. The spartain starts stirring, you pause and look at him. You turn around to see an ant lunge at you.
1122311211.title: Daniel's death

choices: Enter the base Via the roof.
Stay in the air and kill some more ants.
1122311212.content:
You rush out of your quarters and run for your hornet, you get in and radio the hanger manager "Jim, come in Jim," you say into the built in radio "This is Hillary, I need you to open the hanger doors, repeat open the hanger doors."
"Let me guess, Daniel?"
"Yup."
"Ok, but i had nothing to do with this."
You speed out of the doors, soring high above the giant naping toddlers. You soon spot the base covered with swarming ants.
You send a flury of bullets over the vast army of ants, and then blow the roof in with rockets.
1122311212.title: change to Hillary's POV

11223112121.content: You drop from your hornet into the roof carrying a battle rife and a magnum. You look around at the half melted lego and rush down the small hallway only to find it blocked by ants.
11223112121.title: Enter the base Via the roof.

112231121211.content: You charge at the ants firing at them with your battle rifle. Unluckly you don't know about their weak eyes and they grab and munch you with their jaws
112231121211.title: fight the ants

112231121212.content: You drop your battle rifle, which is only weight and run at the ants. Before they grab you, you run up the wall and jump over them. You run of down the hallway once again but with only a magnum. "Daniel come in," You radio "Daniel, this is Hillary, come in, over." "I hear you." You hear "we're pinned down, The ants, theres too many of them. The've broken the barracade and... .... oh no! they've just ate another marine! take this you damned creatures from hell!" You continue alot the hallway only to find stairs leading down stairs. You see a swarming mass of ants and you hear the sound of guns going of.
112231121212.title: jump over them & freerun

1122311212121.content: You run at the ants and start jumping from one heat to another and another, shooting at them as you go. After a while you reach a wall wih a room to the left and a room to the right. You see gunfire coming out of the room and killing the ants. You jump into the room and help the marines fend of the ants. "Shoot at their eyes!" you hear a marine call. You do so and find it kills the ants instantly. "Daniel" you call while fireing at the ants. "Mam," you hear from a fully concious spartain, "he's dead, he died defending me." You are compleatly shocked but keep firing at the ants. "To hell with this!" you cry as you charge at the ants.
1122311212121.title: Charge at the ants

11223112121211.content: You watch in horor as hilary is wached through the wall by an ant, you are certain that no one could survive that sort of an impact without wearing MJOLNIR armor. You unleash yet another flury of bullets charging in again knowing that this is your last stand. As you charge the last handful of marines follow your example charging in behind you. You are pumbled into the ground and torn to pieces. Before the ants finish you off you look back and see them rush towards the marines.
11223112121211.title: MJOLNIR bahh!

choices: ... signals the other ants to you
... is cut short by a gun shot

As you charge at the ants a large ant 'head buts' you through the wall. The impact of the wall would have been fatal but you had secretaly are wearing a MORJLIN vest. The vest takes most of the impact but you are badly wounded. Your left leg hurts and you suspect its broken. You look at the hole in the lego wall that you have just broken through and see the spartain being stampled to death.

You start crawling towards you magnum which landed semingaly a couple yards away. The distance is actualy about an inch.

Just before you reach the gun an ant sees you. The ant curiously scampers over looking at you. It opens it's mouth and screaches. The screach...
11223112121212.title: Keep in hilarys POV

112231121212121.content: You quickly reach for the gun, grabing it and shooting the ant dead in the center of it's eye. You turn to see 20-30 other ants scurry towards you. You fire hoplessly. If only your leg hadn't been broken then you might have been able to dash away. Inevitably the ants cach up with you edging away on the ground. The outcome is very, very messy.

112231121212122.content: You turn around to see where the shot came from. As you turn you see a marine lying on the ground holding a sniper rifle. It looks like the marine fell from the hole you created. you turn around to see the ant. The mist from the sniper rifle shows that it meerly glided of the ants' exo-skeliton. The ant lunges as you...
112231121212122.title: ... is cut short by a gun shot

1122311212121221.content: As you reach for the gun the ant bites of your arm. It then bites of you head.
1122311212121221.title: ... reach for the magnum

1122311212121222.content:
Sucsess!
You hit the ant square in the center of its eye. The ant cowers down. It keeps it's head down. You quickly grab the magnum and aim it at the ant. The ant is still cowering. You reilise why its cowering. Respect. you get an idea. You cant go any where because your leg is broken but you can mabie ride the ant like a horse. You carefully climb onto the ant. No sudden movements. You get on and point where you want to go, towards what looks like a crashed ship. You keep the magnum to the ant's head incase this dosen't work. It dose! the ant scurrys in the direction your pointing.
1122311212121222.title: ... try to punch it

11223112121212221.content:
you speed along thanks to the ants strong legs. As you travel you realise that you're thirsty. You look around but don't see ant water. "more like a desert than a daycare centre" you mutter to yourself. You look down to see the ant starting to stumble, "it must be getting dehydrated" you think.

After what seems to be hours you see something. you look very closely and exclaim "hey that looks like...
11223112121212221.title: keep going

choices: a group of ants surrounded around your ant.
112231121212122211.content:
you grab the ant and point it's head toward the puddle. It dosen't stirr. Nevertheless it continues. You cover about half the distance when the ant stumbles and sends you flying only to land on your back. You thank the fact that your wearing the armored vest. As you get up you notice the ant, almost perfectly still exept for it's jaws franticaly snapping. you realise that it's not going anywhere and continue on yourself.

As you start to reach the water you notice a brown scrap of paper sitting right next to it. You get an idea. you drink your share of water and then use the paper to lift up some water for the ant. you start to walk back to the ant.

As you get colser you notice...
112231121212122211.title: A puddle of water!"

11223112122.content:
You stay in the air , shooting , killing more and more ants with each round.

Just as you see daniel coming out, you yell over the comm "Watch out!" Just then a gigantic leg comes out of nowhere and stands on the base. "Opps" says the male teen. "Whoes toy is this helicopter?". "Uh... mine?" a drowsey toddler calls. "OK, here 'ya go." says the teen grabing the hornet and giving it to the toddler. "Thanks!" says the toddler, immediatly putting you and your hornet into his mouth.
11223112122.title: Stay in the air and kill some more ants.

112231122.content: You run into the room whichis compleatly empty you turn around just in time to see the marines rush into the room, following you. You yell "Quickly to the other room!" but not quick enough, as the ants come swarming in biteing and screaching as they come in. You see a supprisingly large ant swallow the spartain whole and then lunge for you.
112231122.title: Opps

112232.content: You send some marines in as a distraction well the pelicans escaped. You kept some rocket launcher weilding marines with you. The marines you sent in and the pelicans landed. Then a small egg form flood jumped out of the pelican and infected one of the rocket marines. What now?
112232.title: run away

1122322.content: You shoot the small egg shaped thing of of the marine. "What was that!" the marine shouts. You examine the thing, or at least what's left of it after you shot it. "I don't know..." you say as you turn around and face the marines, "but we have to load up into this pelican and get out of here!". There isn't enough room for all the marines, so four stay behind and try to leave the daycare in a warthog.
1122322.title: bust out your BR

11223221.content: You are private Sam, you have been loaded onto a pelican and lifted off. As you are new you have no idea as to what is going on. The pelican begins to fly out of the daycare door, but suddenly, it hits something. It is the daycare manager! The warthog continues to drive out of the center leaving you.
11223221.title: Switch to a marines POV

113.content:
Your ship spirals out of control and somehow shrinks to half a foot, with you inside! no size difference is noticed inside the ship until it crashes into a landscape of barkchips,you look out of a window, and marvel at the sight, kids, lots of them. grsvitating twards your ship... Klaxons blare,Captain Tobruk screams as a hand grabs the ship. and covers up your window. every marine behind you screams as the ship is tilted different angles.

Bad news, one of the crewmen falls out of a broken window before the safety doors deploy. he was grabbed by a kid, who stuck the crewman inside his mouth, and swollowed him. you are freaked out, that crewman is lost inside that kid forever, at least until he poops him out. except not the same...

you decide to run back to the Engineering section, guarded by Major Carlyle's ODSTs. the hardcore troops of the UNSC, when you look out the door, the ODSTs are running around scared. you then decide to run up to the bridge.

Halfway there a bell rings, and your ship is junted forward. on the outside... a kid is carrying your ship in his pocket to his class's show and tell. well, this sucks
113.title: Kindergarten Madness

choices: Stay in the ship and wait
1131.content: The boy sits down in his chair as he waits for his show and tell turn. You realize that this would be the perfect oppurtunity to escape the ship and run. But someone may see you and try to grab you. You gather a few marines and crew members and ask them what they think. They, however, can't agree on what to do.
1131.title: Show and Tell

11311.content: You along with an ODST and two crewmen leave the ship. You four then work your way slowly to the window. Once there you and the other guys jump out of the window onto a flower, then onto the ground. You try to stand up, but you can't. "I can't move!" you shout as you look around. Then you notice that you're in a spider web. The spider has already rolled up two of your men. And is slowly headed for you! The ODST is on the ground, for he missed the spider web. He stares up in horror at you.
11311.title: Classroom Floor

113112.content: You desperately reach for your M6D to shoot the eight legged monster. It notices your quick movements, however, and picks up speed toward you. "Help!" you shout as the spider closes in. You close your eyes as you feel it grab you in its legs. Suddenly, three rounds are heard and the spider dies. It seems that the ODST brought a weapon of his own. "Sorry I didn't help you sooner." he says while shooting the webs around you. You tumble to the ground as the ODST walks off.
113112.title: Stay in your POV

choices: Stay in and go to the boy's house
11312.content: You wait in the ship while the captain decides what to do. Meanwhile, the boy is called up to present his "show and tell" toy. He stands in front of all of the other students and begins his presentation. "This is my toy ship." he begins, holding the ship out for all to see. "I found it somewhere, actually, and I made it mine to play with. I think it might be able to fly so let me try it out.". The boy raises the ship high in the air as the captain shouts "Brace yourselves!". The boy gives it a little throw and wathes it go. To you, the ship is hurl foward and free-falling. It hits the ground hard, damaging it heavily. Alarms come on all around you. The boy hears the alarm and tells the class "See, it has its own alarm system.". The class claps and the bell for school dismissal rings, as the happy kids run out of the class room.
11312.title: Free-Fall

choices: Leave the classroom through the window.
Leave the classroom through the door.
113121.content: You, along with scattered groups of panicking crewmen and marines decide to leave the ship. Just as the kid begins to lift it up to take home, you and the panicking men find a way out of the ship. The kid turns and leaves with the ship. What now...?
113121.title: Leave the ship now!

1131212.content: You and the rest of the crew begin running for the door, the tearcher spots you and yells "ANTS!!!!!!" you quicken you pace as she pulls out a fly swatter as she starts squishing everyone. You see the swatter flying down lightning speed towards your head, suddenly your life flashes before your face and you think "I should have practised running more."
1131212.title: Leave the classroom through the door.

1132.content:
after some time, your crewmembers hear a door shut. a long 30 minutes earlier your ship is dumped onto a flat surface, you decide to go outside. you first put on your marine armor and head out with a MA5B assault rifle. you barely got outside before you hear a high piched voice...

hello toys! the kid says, welcome to my house, I have one dog, a mommy and a daddy and a two year old sister. let's play! you know how little kids are, rushing introductions.
1132.title: home

11321.content: The boy takes you and nine of your fellow marines up to his room, where he places you on his bed. "I'll be right back!" he shouts happily as he leaves the room. "Marines, Status Report!" Sergeant Major Brian shouted. "We're okay sir." one marine replied. "I'm not sure wether we should stay here or try to escape. What do you marines think?". You begin to reply "I think we should-
11321.title: The kid is nice

choices: Stay with the marines and fight
113211.content: The marines agree with you and Brian gives the order to say. Suddenly, you and the marines see another giant. It appears to be a small baby, but she looks huge to the marines. She looks in your direction and begins to walk towards the bed. "Marines open fire!" Brian shouts.
113211.title: stay here

1132111.content: You and the marines open fire on the toddler, but there seems to be no effect. She picks up Brian and examines him. You and the marines gaze on in horror, wonderring what will happen to the Sergeant Major. "C'mon, do your worst!" Brian says confidently. The toddler raises him high into the air and began to shake him. One of the marines jumps onto the toddler's clothes. "I'm coming Sergeant Major!" he shouts.
1132111.title: Stay with the marines and fight

11321112.content: You grab on to the babys clothes and take out your combat knife stabed it into the child for leverage. You start climbing the baby then the kid comes back and swats sergeant major out of the babys hand, '' No megean, bad" He yelled. the child was then pushed out the room. You go to check out the sarge. He has a broken back and a concussion.
11321112.title: Switch to the marine's POV

113211122.content: You look down at the marine and watch him treat Brian's wounds. "You okay sergeant major?" the marine asks. "I don't know.." Brian responded faintly, "That was really brave soldier... but I don't.... think that... I'll make it...". "Sergeant major!!" the marine shouted, as the boy picked them up. "I didn't know you could talk." the boy said as he carried them out of the room. It seemed he for got about you and the other marines. "Let's get out of here !" you say. "But the kid might come back and experiment on us!" one marine crazily replies.
113211122.title: Brian's death

11322.content:
Can't wait to put you in my sister's room! she needs some toys in her room! the kid says, you and eight other crewmen are "picked" to make the journey into the little toddler's room. he carries you in his hand to the room. you openly think that you will either be sucked on in a mouth or dropped into a dirty diaper.
the...
11322.title: Chosen Demise at the hands of a two year old

113221.content:
Here sissy, some little people to eat! the kid says as he leaves the room with an evil smirk on his face.
you scream as you are inserted into a mouth by a Titanic Two year old. you enter the throat after being covered in saliva.
113221.title: Eaten!

1132212.content: As you try to climb out, you notice that, its not up to you. The toddler is willingly spitting you out. It seems she does not like the taste of your armour. Hurled to the floor in a puddle of spit, you thank your lucky stars for your amours taste.
1132212.title: Luck!

11322121.content: The giant toddler grabbed your crew and started to suck on them like a pacifier. You grabbed a giant rattle to distract it and the titanic toddler spits them out and plays with her rattle
11322121.title: Tolddler plays more!

11322122.content:
You watch as the Toddlers mother comes in and picks up her child. “You shouldn’t be playing with your brothers toys! Get in here boy, your sister almost ate one of your army men!” As one giant baby leaves, another , worse giant comes in. It’s the kid from before. He looks down at you and grins.

Bending down he looks at you and your men. “I guess you didn’t like playing with my sister? Guess its time to play with the big boy then huh!?” He laughs.

” I think we should play….”
11322122.title: Big Boy's toy's

113221221.content:
The boy looks at you, how you are covered with his little baby sisters saliva.” You’ve given me a great idea!” he rushes back to his room, and returns with a giant day glow green container. You cant make it out from where it is.

”Heres how it will work! The monster has just attacked!” From his hidden hand he pulls out a very large action figure, to you it looked to some giant movie monster you’ve never seen before. It had a clear belly however, and had open holes all around it.” It’s the slime monster of planet 6. now.. do what do you want. You can either be their commander, whos trapped in the belly of the monster, and have your crew safe you, or you can watch in horror as your entire team gets slimed!”
113221221.title: Monsters!

1132212211.content:
You bravely tell him that you’ll take it and the team can save you. You have faith in your marines! You watch as the boy takes the day glow green container and opens it. He pours it in the mouth of the action figure, and all over its body. Picking you up, he thrusts you head first in to its mouth. “ Arg.. no save me men!” he shouts, trying to imitate your voice.

You slide down the fake monsters mouth, and get plopped in to the large stomach area. Theres slime all around you. Its not very liquid like at all, its like your slowly being slopped by molasses, only this isn’t sweet, its day glow green, and smells horrible.
1132212211.title: Slimed!

11322122111.content: As the goo flows around your body you feel yourself slipping downward into it. The only small mercy in this "exercise" is that your armor protects you from feeling much of the slime. However it does not prevent the foul smell from reaching you. It is not the first time you have smelt this slime, afterall you were once his age as well, yet the sheer quantity of it transforms it into something far beyond. To your horror you still can find no footing below within the monsters. Instead you steadily sink down into the toy's "innards", able only to slosh your feet through the ooze. You manage to keep yourself from succumbing to fear however. Afterall it is only a child's toy, your units weapons should be able to slice through it with minimal trouble.
11322122111.title: Choice of Perspective

choices: Eat a few more of them.
Let your dog teach them another lesson.
113221221112.content:
As the tiny marine struggles within the slime-filled chamber of your toy, a squad of three other toys rushes it. In a flash of tiny ammunition they open fire on the monster with their arms. The tiny bullets slice into the head and upperchest of your toy, yet it does not seem to leave much of an impact. This turn of events seems to shock the soldiers, though you are not so surprised. Afterall it makes sense for their bullets to be just as small as them. The soldiers seem to pause for a moment, as the devoured commander continues to sink, finally realizing that they truly are helpless in this new world. But they're sense of duty remains firm and they rush the toy with their full energy. Using only their bare hands the marines tear into the plastic vinyl of the monster's chest and tear it free. To them it is a deluge of slime as the goo oozes out of the fractured beast. But they do not care, the only concern of the marines is to pull their commander to freedom. It seems that the marines have certainly won this game, but you are not satisfied.

With a smirk you look down at your toys. "Wow, you guys have escaped from being devoured twice in one day! I guess there isin't any monster out there that can eat you, huh?" Your grin grows wider as you reach down and pluck up a single marine from the floor, whom is free from the slime. Without a word you extend your tongue and place him on top. The frightened marine raises his gun and begins to open fire upward, to the direct path that would lead to your brain. The shots strike true, but the "burns" are nothing more than mild tickles. More likely to provoke a sneeze than death. Many other toys join in the attack, gunfire rains upon your torso, but it is utterly futile. Your mouth closes over the marine, just as he cracks. The last thing his comrades hear from him is an interrupted scream, followed by a soft gulp. All that remains is a small bulge in your throat. Smiling again your smugly pat your stomach, letting out a loud burp. "Oops, looks like you can be eaten afterall. You just need the right "monster".
113221221112.title: Monster Food

1132212211121.content:
The marines moved back in fear, staring at you with their guns.

"Hm, monster needs more food!"

the toddler runs into the room naked, only wearing a diaper. the kid looks down at the marines, and does a strange tiger growl before walking off.

You just remembered yourself, you could shock these marines. even though you had the height of a 4 year old, you were 5.

"Get back!" One of the marines yelled.

You slowly walked towards the marines.

"well toys, time to let you in on my secret"

"Secret?" all of the marines dove for cover.

You were going to reveal the largest secret in your life... you were never potty trained. your parents thought you didn't need to be trained.

You slipped your pants off, revealing a soft and white Huggies diaper

The marines turned around and started laughing

you fashioned a smile, these were toys, only toys.

(Marine POV)

"Ha, ha..."

"Shut up Anderson"

(Back)

"Ha! toys, I was never potty trained. just like my brother."

You felt a plop in your lower intestine, maybe one your toys wants to see it.

(Marine POV)

"Anderson, come on man"

"Dude, he's like what? 5? and he still wears- AHHHH!!"

(Your POV)

"So, little toy, want to see what I do in my diaper?"

"Bring it on!" said the marine as you dropped him into your diaper.

you walked over the marine group and squatted down.

"Well toy, I'm gonna make a poop in my diaper"

Inside your diaper, the marine saw a large log emerging from your anus, you sat down further, so the rest of the toys could hear the scream of their comrade, being crushed by a falling combination of what used to be carrots, cheese, bread, and lots of candy.

You felt more, and kept pushing.

Eventually, the marine's screams were silenced. he had given up, buried under two logs of poop.

"I'm gonna end this" you said.

the last thing the marine saw, was a large butt coming towards him at a fast pace.

"SQUISH"

The rest of the marines scattered, none of them wanted to meet the fate of their comrade, Anderson.
1132212211121.title: Secret revealed

11322122111212.content:
The kid's young mother walked into the room.

"Ew! did you make a poopy Ethan?"

The marines down below now knew the kid's name, and backed into the shadows.

The tapes were ripped off, and a large collection of digested food let out a reek stench.

"He he, mommy..." Ethan said, getting changed.

"Alright Ethan, that diaper can is full, I'm gonna need you to take it out back"

"Alright mommy" Ethan said.

with that, and a new diaper, Ethan walked towards the group of marines.

"Since one of your friends is my poop, some you will go see him!" and with that, 5 marines were grabbed by his hand, and thrown into the can of diapers.
11322122111212.title: Kid needs a change

113221221112121.content:
"You guys get compactor" Ethan said, carrying the can of used diapers and marines into the back laundry room.

"No, NO!" One of the marines reacted.

"These are where our diapers go" Ethan said.

the can tipped, sending thhe marines and diapers tumbling into the compactor unit.

"you diapers turn into little squares" Ethan said, holding up a cube of compressed diapers.

One of the marines fired. but Ethan sweated it off like nothing.

"Uh oh, toys not happy!"

Ethan slammed the door shut, and pressed the activate button.

"See? you get to see my diapers!" Ethan said.

Inside the compactor, the marines dove into a folded diaper, the entire thing was jammed with Ethan's poop. the remains of Anderson included in there.

The device rammed, and the last thing they saw was a wall of waste coming at them.

An hour later, the process was done. Ethan walked in and saw the cube of squished diapers.

"hope you guys saw my diapers" he said, carrying the flattened cube to the garbage can. leaving the marines to a rather "crappy" fate.
113221221112121.title: squishy!

113221221112122.content:
After a while, Ethan returned. every marine left knew that the marines taken, were already being squished.

Ethan sat down, diaper in between his legs, ready to adress the 60 remaining marines.

"Alright toys, I will let you live if you do something for me."

Every marine was worried.

"You have to check my poopy diapers, and guess what food is in there. if you guess wrong, I poop some more, or my mommy changes me, you are part of my poo then, and will be treated like it."

Every marine looked weird.

His brother walked in, alough 2 years, he towered over every marine.

"Oh yeah, you have to do the same to my brother's poopy diapers, same rules,"

"And, I forgot, my brother thinks he's a tiger, and also, you'll live in the toybox, and... my brother can eat any of you if you're in the toybox, or working, he's a man-eating tiger."

With that, the marines hopped into their pelicans, and went to the toybox to build a base.

"Come Gavin, er, I mean tiger, let's go eat.
113221221112122.title: A dirty job

1132212211121222.content:
It took a while, and the base was complete.

"Rawr, RAWR" Came the tigerlike roar of Gavin,

"Rawr! my diaper poopy"

"Jones, Carter, go check"

"Ugh, yes sarge"

The marines climbed onto the floor. Gavin was inverted.

"In my diapa!" Gavin said as Jones and Carter crawled through the elastic leg opening. inside the diaper, Gavin's wee wee stood above, as Jones and Carter looked through the light brown mess.

Gavin smiled, and smelly air permeated the diaper.

"toot" Gavin said.

"Carrots, leattuce, chocolate, and milk?" Said Jones.

11322122111212222.content:
"Wrong!" shouted Gavin

With that, the titanic tot jumped up and landed on his butt, crushing Jones and Carter beneath his tush.

"did tiger make a poop?" Their mom came out of nowhere.

Laying Gavin down on his back, his mother couldn't see the crushed marines, they were stuck deep into Gavin's soupy poop.

With a new diaper, Gavin got up, and threw the diaper into the diaper genie
11322122111212222.title: Wrong! you're tiger poop now!

113221221112122221.content:
The marines were in disbelief that their comrades had just been squished. but to their dismay...

"Hi, ready?"

With a smell worse than before, three marines were chosen. Hawkins, Johnson, and Haggard.

Ethan laid down on his bed, and smiled at the men going to undertake a dangerous job in his pants.

Everyone squeezed through the opening in his leg elastic.

"You guys are lucky, I'm not Gavin"

Haggard tripped over a kernel of corn the size of his torso.

"I guess corn and other things"

"Uh oh" Ethan said.

A rumble was heard, and a large poot sounded.

"Ha, don't worry, just a fart"

The marines looked up again.

"Uh oh" Ethan said again.

Ethan let loose a giggle.

"Better get out of there!" Ethan said, focusing his strength on his bowel muscles. he shook upwards, causing everyone to fall into the muck.

Behind them, the marines could do nothing. already, a turd was poking out of Ethan's butt.

with that turd now in his diaper, Ethan smiled.

"Hmm..."
113221221112122221.title: Ethan comes

1132212211121222212.content:
"Don't worry, that poopie doesn't count" Said Ethan. "But you still have to see what's in it!"

Cutting open the log with a combat knife, fine orange strings, membrane, and corn were exposed.

"Alright Ethan, Mandarin oranges, Carrots, and popcorn?"

"Right!"

Everyone clapped hands together, and exited the mess that was the huggies diaper.

Above them, Ethan smiled. "those toys were lucky"

With one diaper down, a billion more to go...
1132212211121222212.title: I'll give you another chance

choices: convince Lt: Berkley or Maj Carlyle
11322122112.content: you sit in the goo as your team decides to rescue you. you feel happy as your team, lead by 1st Lt Scott Berkley and Major Joshua Carlyle. bust through the "stomach" the kid starts acting up, not expecting them to complete this so fast. "oh yeah that goo was boogers from my nose! which is were you are all going!" he says. "now decide who goes first!"
11322122112.title: Aftermath

113221221122.content:
“Berkley! I order you to go up that kids nose!” You cant believe you just said that after they had rescued you. He looked at you funny. The kid heard you though and grabs him. With out finesse he shoves him right up his nose.

”Ah.. right in the boog… the boog.. the.. AHHHHCHOOO” Apparently the kid was allergic to Lieutenants. He flies out of his knows, and lands before you. You cant recognize him at first, because he is submerged in a large wad of snot.

”…….”
113221221122.title: Afraid Snot

1132212211221.content:
You take off your helmet, and start to remove your body armour. Its just you now, au natural. You look up at the giant who claims you and your men as his toys.

”Listen to me! You can do what ever you want to me, cover me in snot, shove me in your sisters diaper, have your dad sit on me and fart for hours, anything. You just let my men go!” whether or not he agrees, one things for sure, you have just given him plenty of ideas to play with.
1132212211221.title: Fed up

11322122112212.content: Forget it! he said. "your men are toys! and that is all that they are going to be!" "but, what the heck! i can just eat one of you!" "you choose!" he says. you look at the most liable member of your team. Capt. Scott Mitchell. who is staring at you. you look to the side... a circle of light appears with a ship coming through. smaller than your Marathon cruiser, it clatters to the ground and splits. sending the crew and "passengers" about. the "leader" gets up "Hi, I'm Doctor Timothy Trondenhem, we tested out that new ONI drive and ended up here!" "I was transporting new spartan candidates, the oldest is 13 and the yougest is 11. we have about 20 candidates here. their leader is Trenton Holmberg. he is the eldest and the best shot. the kid is stunned and out on his bed

After an hour of introduction the kid gets up. more toys! he squeals happily. but first opening his mouth to show you your final destination. he grabs Capt Mitchell and instantly throws him onto his bed. the doorbell rings...

it's his friends coming over to look at what he found. they rush into his room to find his captives. "hey nick! found this other ship on the ground" one of his friends said.

choices: Stick them in my younger sister's room and see if they survive tomorrow!
1132212211221211.content:
you look at the ship, it seems to be a covenant lifepod, two beings tumble out, you raise your weapon. Trenton grabs his Sniper Rifle and stares at the two Elites on the ground. "Greetings Humans, I am the Arbiter and this is The Special ops leader" You adknowledge the fact that the enemy is right in front of you, but the presence of children makes you want to hold your fire.

Trenton fires his SR round and throws the weapon down since it's out of ammo

Both elites show a feeling of ceasefire and throw down their weapons. "look at these cool toys!" the kid said. Let's...
1132212211221211.title: Arbiter and Half-Jaw

113221222.content:
"Let's play hide and seek!" he says, "now, there is a catch, if I find you, I eat you!" he remarks happily as you shudder in fear. you look at your 20+ group of afraid crewmen. you run off to hide in a part of fabric that happens to be the boy's underwear! you stay there as you hear him walking around the house. occasionally hearing screams of your comrades as they are swallowed alive. soon, the footsteps approach your hiding place.

you see the glare of the sunlight as the kid grabs you. "you seem to have been the hardest one to find, time to join your friends in my tummy!" you shriek and pull out your M6D but to no avail. it clatters to the floor below. you soon slide into the kid's belly, fully intact. as you see one of your fellow Marines, Sgt Edward Shacklton swimming in the stomach acid, you...
113221222.title: Into the belly of the beast

1132212221.content:
you begin to dissolve, not after you put a M6D round in your head, That evening, the boy feels the need to use the bathroom, he sits down on the toilet, and excretes the remains of you and your crewmen, knowing that he fed some of his "captives" to his baby sister and dog, and knew that they would come out the same as you did, as poop. after a "flushing of the toilet" funeral, his sister cries, and lets out a turd in her diaper, he asks to change her, and as she is set on the changing table, another turd comes out, this time with Captain James Tobruk's body, him frozen with a look of horror on his face. knowing he would soon be going from the Captain of a UNSC crusier to an excretement from a two year old.

"Damn ONI Idiots, they will pay!"
last words of the late Captain James Tobruk, found by an ONI scout ship researching the dimention and ending up in the trash. crew members found his remains inside a rotting diaper.

The crew of the Vancouver were given Posthumus medals of honor, A memorial of the Ill-fated expedition now sits in the cities of Vancouver BC and Vancouver Washington. whose crew was mainly from. ONI scrapped the project after more ships were lost.
1132212221.title: End, or is it?

113222.content:
The toddler grabs you, it looks as if its going to swallow you and your eight marines, but instead, its hands go down to its diaper. Suddenly, you find your self immersed in a white fluffy, but clearly soiled diaper.

”Status report!” the marines answer alright. They are clinging to the soft cotton walls. One soldier calls out for help. Privet Jensen is on his first mission with you. Hes grabbing on the walls, but the cotton is tearing away. “Sir, sir I’m slipping! I cant.. I Ahhhh!” his grip gives way and he plumetts down. Below him, the large pile of crap in the toddlers diapers away him. He sinks in up to his chest. He seems alright sir.

“Sir. I’m alright.. its not very..oh.. my.. god!” He cried out. The toddlers butt part slowly. Jensen cries out as a torrent of heavy shit, the size of a dump truck piles on to him. The toddler shifts, sitting on Jensen. Its only a matter of time before his radio goes dark.

”Damn it…”
113222.title: Diaper Situation

choices: he begins to toy with you
1132222.content:
you stay back, as you hear Jensen scream as pee floods the diaper, "Sarge, you had to do that?"
"Shut up 1st Lt Berkley!" you say. on the outside...


Mommy!!! she screams "me made poopies!" the mother wrinkles her nose "yes you did sweetie, let's get you changed" you feel the weight shift, as you and the marines hold on to the cotton. 1st Lt Berkley looses his grip and plummets into the poop, still coming out solidly. his armor is covered in damp sludge. soon, the baby is laid on her side. you and the 6 other marines fall into the poop. the diaper opens, with the mother freaking out, Honey there are bugs in your poop! she says. the sister responds by letting out more poop, completly covering your team. you always wondered why you failed your high school human anatomy class. now, you became the thing that was often "eliminated"

the mother responds. "good job sweetie! now, let me throw that thing away!" you stare at the man beside you, for 20 years old he is quite a sissy. "1st Lt Scott Berkley you are a very unlucky man." soon you are tossed into a trash can face down into more dirty diapers! apperantly you are about to become more unlucky.

that kid from before digs through the pile of dirty diapers before finding yours. "i see that you have been found by my sister!" he says as he carries the diaper to a certain room. "poop goes in the potty where it belongs!" he says as he scrapes you off the diaper and into the toilet.
1132222.title: Waste not?

choices: Go to the Vehicle Bay and recon the area in a 'Hog
114.content: In the midst of your confusion, you head to the engine room. warning klaxons blare as the Captain's voice booms over the intership intercom "ALL HANDS, BRACE FOR IMPACT" 30 seconds later, the sound of a hull grinding against a rubber surface. After 3 minutes of torture, you head to your station. while doing that...
114.title: Playground crash

1141.content: You get a warthog and leave with a passenger and a gunner. Sandy hills is almost all you can see until some kids begin chaisng you. Your gunner decides to open fire on the children, with no results. "Now what!" the gunner shouts. A child attempts to pick up the warthog and everyone except the gunner jumps out. The gunner is taken by a kid he runs off with him. You and Raymond, the passenger, run for your lives on the sandy terrain.
1141.title: Go to the Vehicle Bay and recon the area in a &...

11411.content: The children thought it would be fun to torture him. First they took turns farting and burping on the gunner. Then they took a pen and poked his eyes out. The screams of the crew men could'nt be heard over the laghter of the children. One by one his limbs were torn from his body. Then moments later he died from shock. The worst part about it was that that flight was his last before he could go home before he go home and see his pregnant wife.
11411.title: Switch to the gunner's POV

114112.content: "We got away John!" you say as you two are walking through brushes of grass that are as tall as small trees. "Yeah, but the gunner didn't make it..." he replies solemnly. You two come to a clearing where ahead, you see a busy road filled with many cars. You realize that a UNSC command base is not far from here. "Hey," you tell John "there's a UNSC base nearby.". John looks over at you, "Really? Where is it?". You look towards the huge street filled with cars and sigh, "Well we would have to cross that road right there, but I think we should just follow it until we can go around it.". John gives you a stare, "I say we go across this road now." he says as begins running towards it. "No John!" you cry at after him.
114112.title: The Clearing

11412.content: You run for your life while looking back at the poor gunner who is probably being tortured by the kids. Luckily, no kids seem to see you and John. Eventually, you come to a large grassy area. "Woah!" you say, "That was too close!". "The marine though..." John sighs. Before you two can further converse, a large swarm of ants begin to surround you. Seeing that you don't have any weapons, you feel helpless as they begin to close in. "This it it." you think to yourself. Suddenly, a pelican flies over head, and sends down a small group of marines to fight off the ants while you and John load into it. The marines attempt to hold off while you fly back towards the ship.
11412.title: Switch to Raymond's POV

114122.content: While flying to the ship you can only feel a sense of relief, as you came close to death twice within a few minutes. Once you get to the ship area, however, you are suprised to learn that it isn't there! "Where did the ship go!?" the pilot exclaims as he reconed the area. Suddenly, a transmission comes through, and the captain begins to speak. "We have been taken to a house of some sort. A boy is tossing the ship about and we are taking heavy damage. You crewmen and marines need to save yourselves, and get to the UNSC command base in this city. Maybe then they will know what to do.".
114122.title: Stay on your POV

choices: James begins to push through the crowd to grab the ship
1142.content:
You hear the sound of stomping as you head to the Briefing room. a while later, you join the rest of the crew outside the ship.

5 year old James Smith was headed to the play structure of the Happy Mills Playground when he noticed a small silver object on the ground. by then, a swarm of kids gathered around it.

In your perspective...
1142.title: Bad Crash landing

11421.content: You stare in awe as one of the kids sets his hand around Ssgt Donald Braeburn and Lt Blake Randall, both stunned marines return fire. Their attack is futile as they try running to the ship to join the rest of the crew in the docking bay. the child grabs both fear-stricken ODSTs and flies off to a vacant table to play with his new "toys"
11421.title: Kid Attack!

choices: He lowers you to his anus
He drops you into the toilet water
114211.content: You Are Lt Blake Randall, to think the horrors of basic training were enough. now you are this kid's micro playtoy, about 1/8 in tall. you open fire desperately with your MA5B Assault rifle but to no avail. you reach for your rocket launcher, but the weapon is jammed. "Guess what" the kid says to you and your scared-as-hell comrade. "Now, what to do with you two?" he says as he goes into a restroom stall.
114211.title: Captured!

1142111.content:
The kid sets you on the rim of the toilet bowl, and bends down. In front of you and your fellow officer is arguably the largest ass you have ever seen. You’ve been in side the barracks before, you know what’s coming, but still how can you prepare your self for it. You hear the kid laugh briefly. Suddenly you are hit by the sonic waves of the largest fart you’ve ever experienced. The force is to great, you’re going to fall! You look to your left to see that the staff sergeant is as well. Luckily though, just as he goes over the edge, his hand reaches up and grabs the rim, preventing him from falling. You try to follow his example, but fail. As you turn, you slip in a small pool of water, tossing you forward. The combine effort of the fart and the slip send you tumbling down head first in to the toilet. It is at this time that you realize, like most public toilets, this one is not working. That hasn’t stopped anyone from using it though. With all the elegance of a belly flow, you are soon dunked in to what can only be described as a large pudding bowl of crap. You are instantly submerged, covering your armour completely in brown sludge. Its thick though, and you wont sink to the bottom. Still.. its hell. Luckily for you however your armour is built strong, and keeps most of it out. Your boots are filled, and several plops from the inside of your helmet suggest its time for a more watertight helmet.

You hear a bell ring, and the kid, and who ever else might be in the bathroom leave.

The staff sergeant radios in for help, and the Pelican soon arrives to rescue you both.

As you climb aboard the pelican, the rest of the men are there waiting for you. Your stench is unbearable, and several of them walk away. Prvt. Jones however, decides he cannot pass up the opportunity to make a joke at your expense. “Excuse me.. Lieutenant but.. is it me.. or did you just fart? Something sure stinks”
1142111.title: Brown lake

choices: "Head first privet.. thats an order!"(Switch to Jones POV)
"You didnt take that seriously did you?"
11421111.content:
Insulted by the joke, you decide to reprimand the joking privet. “That’s very funny privet. But I can do you one better. Ive decide what your orders are..” Your masks hides it but you smile wickedly as you prepare to tell the private the good new.

”Your orders are to go out and take position up in that toilet bowl. I want you to stand by and report back anything strange that goes on. After an hour or two, we will come back to pick you up if nothings happened” The other men laugh, the privet groans. He can do nothing but fulfill your orders though/ As he moves towards the open bay doors that lead back to the lake of crap that is the toilet bowl, you stop him.” Wait just a moment Privet. We haven’t tested that armour against long term exposer to.. what ever might be in there. Best if you leave it here” There’s a small spot of silence, followed by muffled laughter, and one solitary groan of agony. Grudgingly the privet removes his helmet, boots and body armour leaving just his undergarments and a thin t-shirt. Approaching the edge, he bends down preparing to enter. You stop him though with a hand on his shoulder. He signs in relief, thinking you’ve had enough of the joke
11421111.title: Only a joke?

114211111.content:
Oh man, you think, there has to be some sort of rule that says your commanding officer cant order you to do this. If you ever get back, you plan to look up and file a complaint. For now though, you grudgingly dive forward in to the muck. You find out the hard way though that, its quite solid unless your falling from the top of the bowl. You skitter forward, sinking only about 7 inches down. Standing up you turn to face the pelican, wiping off a good three handfuls off your face.

”Now who’s laughing..” he says as he waves good by. The men behind him laugh loudly. There you stand, up to your feet and covered head to toe in crap. You watch as your pelican lifts out of the bowl and flies off. As you watch it take off how ever..
114211111.title: Orders are orders

1142111111.content: Taking the easy way out, you decide not to go. You wait in the crappy toilet for hours. No one sends you anything on your radio. You have no idea what’s going on. You hear a bell ring, and children pour in to the boys room. You do your best to hide, but its to no use. Kid after kid come into use the toilet, and you are over come by a mountain of crap. You scream as you see it land on top of you. Then all is silent. Because you followed orders to the letter, you are now slowly suffocating and being crushed under a mountain of crap.
1142111111.title: Slow Death

1142111112.content:
In shock you watch as a very large boy grabs your shipmates.”Hey.. who’d leave a toy like this in the bathroom” he says. Smiling he turns and runs off. You were ordered to stay here, but clearly they did not plan on a large kid stealing the ship. You could save them if you follow where the boy is heading off to!

Screw orders! They need you! You look around for any way to escape the bowl. How can you climb up the porcelain walls though, you don’t have the tools for that! Suddenly from above a shadow looms over the bowl. Someone’s come to use it. Now might be your only chance. Grunting, the man starts the long process of dropping a major turd. With a great amount of bravery, and skill that would make your old drill sergeant proud, you bravely scale the turd, up to the mans ass, and grab on to his pants. He gets up and leaves the bathroom. You can find your fellow marines now
1142111112.title: Escape!

11421112.content: ha ha, very funny, you remark. you throw a cd into the pelican's CD player, the pelican flies off to the ship that is still crashed, while the pelican's crew listened to Ill Nino's "Have You Ever Felt" track you stare out the back. and look at your counterpart. you figure out that you need more then enough leave. but...
11421112.title: escape

1142112.content:
With a snap, his hand sends you and your buddy into the cold water, your armor keeps you afloat but leaves you cold in the water. "I have to poop now!" he says. You & your comrade scream for an extraction but they can't get to you at the moment.

He sits down on the toilet. a huge fart rips out from the little kid's anus but is muffled by your COM gear. seconds later a brown log emerges from the kid's butt and splashes right on top of the head of Ssgt Braeburn. instantly knocking him out and leaving his armor coated in sludge soon...
1142112.title: In the toilet

11421121.content: You see the kid reach for the lever and he pulls it down, you swirl down the toilet as you are pounded into the kid's poop. you now come to face a watery grave...
11421121.title: Flushed!

114212.content: As you watch your two ODST buddies get hauled away to parts unknown, you head to the bridge. One of your friends, Pvt Phillip Hendricson stops you on your way to your quarters. you two chat. The alarm suddenly sounds, you know it, a nearby view screen confirms it. appearently a few marines set out on a warthog to scout the area and were being followed by some HUGE kids. What do you do?
114212.title: Resolve

choices: Forget the ship and get out of there!
1142121.content:
You run to the recon bay with Phillip, and jump into a hog. Seconds later, you are outside on the rubber-like terrain. Ahead you spot the marines coming towards you. Three marines are standing on the ground shivering in fear. You drive up to them, "Get in!" Phillip shouts. They jump into the back of your transport hog and you take off at high speed. While going back to the ship, however, you notice that it is being tossed around by kids.

You know that you have tow decisions. You could distract the kids, but that might get you killed. Or you could let the ship be destroyed.
1142121.title: Save those marines

11421211.content: you mange to attract the attention of the kids and get them away from the ship. you then lose the kids and get back to the ship then...
11421211.title: Distract the kids

choices: The ship is thrown into a garbage truck
a kid takes your ship to another part of the playground
1142122.content:
You come out of your scared-state to watch how pathetic their attempts were. meanwhile a live radio feed from the group played "This is OP 3! We went out to scout but we are being follow AH AH AHG!!!!!!" the warthog was lifted up and the kids were overherd chatting about what to do with the frightened marines
"I don't know, lets keep the jeep and throw these dolls away!" a young kid possibly 7 years of age said. the marines now were hystarical, they were expecting a good life and an escape from this "world" not to be thrown away like rubbish. indeed, the dazed men were dropped into a trash can by a restroom. all except for one, the passenger. Cpl David Jacobson who was taken into the restroom and was flushed down the toilet!. You and the rest of the crew are scared for their lives. A loud bang from outside the ship is heard...
1142122.title: Sad fate of Warthog 21550.

info.brief_description: When a crusier makes an uncalculated jump, something happens
info.description:
The Marathon class crusier Vancouver becomes a test ship for an experimental slipspace drive and develops a malfunction, thereby shrinking the ship to a foot in length and catipulting it to the 21st century, Crew and all try to keep the ship stable in the earth's atmosphere but fail.
Make up names for the crew and marines but stay on topic!
No sex, remember this story is 13+
The ship can crash
the crew has weapons, all of which do not work against the giants but the crew does not know that...

the POV must remain 2nd person
you may switch POVs
the ship may shrink more.
Thx to Enterthedragon for adding

Get to writing people!!!
